question: Jason Davis, who recently passed away, was associated with which profession?
explanation:
The American actor Jason Davis, who was a former child actor, passed away unexpectedly at the age of 35. He was very famous for being the voice actor on the animated series named \"Recess\", broadcasted in the Disney Channel. He lent his voice to the character of ‘Mikey Blumberg’, one of the six elementary school students of the series.
Jason Davis was also the co-founder of a research fund agency called ‘Cure Addiction Now’.
